question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/execution_tracing/recorders.rs] [Trait: TraceRecorder] [is_enabled() Consistency] Can the return value of is_enabled() (line 20) change during execution, causing some instructions to be recorded while others are skipped, creating inconsistent traces?
